title: Marketplace Roundtable #24: Talking REITs with Colorado Wealth Management
description: Colorado Wealth Management Fund runs The REIT Forum, so it's no surprise that this podcast focuses on the real estate investment trusts. Drawing on his background in accounting and finance, Colorado Wealth Management discusses the importance of great fundamentals in selecting a REIT, and how their focus on the sector allows them to do a few things very well.
itunes:title: Talking REITs with Colorado Wealth Management
itunes:author: Seeking Alpha
itunes:subtitle: A deep dive into the REITs market also discussing the pros and cons of preferred stocks
